title: Compliance-Forward Patio Service
system_mod: Center on compliance: age verification, labeling, off-well storage limits, batch documentation, and staff scripts.
venue_context: Large patio bar with two satellite stations and frequent private events. New city audit standards just rolled out.
prompt: Build a compliance-first service plan for our patio: ID checks, batch logs/labels, allergy notation, guest signage, and server scripts. Include a pre-shift compliance checklist and incident escalation flow.
